post.description: Generate a nonce for Sign-In With Ethereum (SIWE) authentication

walletAddress.description: Ethereum wallet address (must be 42 characters starting with 0x)

chainId.description: Blockchain network chain ID (default: 1 for Ethereum mainnet)

nonce.description: Cryptographically secure random nonce to be used in SIWE message

400.description: Bad Request. Invalid wallet address format or parameters.

401.description: Unauthorized. Due to missing or invalid authentication.

500.description: Internal Server Error. This is a problem with the server that you cannot fix.

post.description: Verify a signed SIWE message and authenticate the user

message.description: The SIWE message string that was signed

signature.description: The signature from the user's wallet

walletAddress.description: Ethereum wallet address (must be 42 characters starting with 0x)

chainId.description: Blockchain network chain ID (must match the Chain ID in SIWE message, default: 1)

400.description: Bad Request. Invalid parameters or email required when anonymous is disabled.

401.description: Unauthorized. Invalid or expired nonce, invalid signature, or chainId mismatch.

500.description: Internal Server Error. This is a problem with the server that you cannot fix.

post.description: Generates a cryptographically secure nonce for creating a SIWE message to link a wallet to the current authenticated user. Requires active session.

walletAddress.description: Ethereum wallet address (must be 42 characters starting with 0x)

chainId.description: Blockchain network chain ID (default: 1 for Ethereum mainnet)

nonce.description: Cryptographically secure nonce to use in SIWE message

400.description: Bad Request. Invalid wallet address format or parameters.

401.description: Unauthorized. User must be logged in to link a wallet.

500.description: Internal Server Error.

post.description: Verifies the SIWE signature and links the wallet to the currently authenticated user. Requires active session.

message.description: The SIWE message string that was signed

signature.description: The signature from the user's wallet

walletAddress.description: Ethereum wallet address (must be 42 characters starting with 0x)

chainId.description: Blockchain network chain ID (must match the Chain ID in SIWE message, default: 1)

success.description: Whether the wallet was successfully linked

walletAddress.description: The checksummed Ethereum address that was linked

isPrimary.description: Whether this is the user's primary wallet (first wallet linked)

ensName.description: ENS name associated with the wallet (if available)

code.description: Error code indicating the type of error

400.description: Bad Request. Wallet already linked to another account or invalid parameters.

code.description: Error code indicating the authentication failure reason

401.description: Unauthorized. User not logged in, invalid/expired nonce, or invalid signature.

500.description: Internal Server Error. Failed to link wallet.

get.description: Get all SIWE wallets linked to the authenticated user with full wallet metadata including primary status and chain information. Requires active session.

id.description: Unique identifier for this wallet record

userId.description: User ID this wallet is linked to

isPrimary.description: Whether this is the user's primary wallet

createdAt.description: Timestamp when the wallet was linked

401.description: Unauthorized. User is not authenticated.

500.description: Internal Server Error.

post.description: Remove a linked wallet from the authenticated user account. If the wallet being unlinked is the primary wallet, another wallet will be automatically promoted to primary. Requires active session.

walletAddress.description: Ethereum wallet address to unlink (must be 42 characters starting with 0x)

chainId.description: Blockchain network chain ID (default: 1 for Ethereum mainnet)

code.description: Error code indicating the type of error

400.description: Bad Request. Cannot unlink last authentication method, wallet not found, or invalid parameters.

401.description: Unauthorized. User is not authenticated.

500.description: Internal Server Error. Failed to unlink wallet.
